LanguageData.BoatFishingDesc: Gather fish. Depth of water affects fishing chances.
LanguageData.VehicleRoutePlannerButtonTip: Click to enter the planning mode for Vehicles where you can select specific vehicles you own, and plan your journey. Pathing is adjusted based on the vehicles selected.
LanguageData.DevModeShipsTooltip: Turn on DevMode to view the different options for debugging or fixing stuff with Boats
LanguageData.BeachGenMultiplierTooltip: Increase the amount of water on the coastline.
LanguageData.BeachGenMultiplierLargeTooltip: Current number is larger than recommended. The ocean can and may take up to as large as 80% of the map and larger maps will be scattered with lakes.
LanguageData.ForceSettlementCoastTooltip: Push nearby faction settlements to the coast if within given radius
LanguageData.PassiveWaterWavesTooltip: Generate passive waves for each boat. Purely cosmetic.
LanguageData.DrawUpgradeInformationScreenTooltip: Draw additional menu on the upgrade menu to display ship stats and ship icon.
LanguageData.UseIngameTimeTooltip: Switch the time scale for what is displayed in the upgrade menu.
LanguageData.FullVehiclePathingTooltip: Use the entire hitbox of the vehicle to determine pathing constraints (prevents Vehicles from going through smaller passages than hitbox size).
LanguageData.DebugDraftAnyShipTooltip: Be able to draft and move any boat regardless of passengers. Useful if your boat gets stuck somewhere.
LanguageData.DebugDisablePathingTooltip: Disable boats using custom water based path finding, and instead use vanilla pathfinding. NOTE: Boats will travel like pawns
LanguageData.ShuffledCannonFireTooltip: Randomize the order in which broadside cannons fire.
LanguageData.RiverTravelAllowedTooltip: Allow boats to travel along rivers.
LanguageData.BoatSizeMattersOnRiversTooltip: Restrict boats to only be able to travel on rivers that are large enough to fit it. If disabled, all boats can travel on any river. If you bring a boat into a map with a river that cannot fit the size of the boat, it might spawn on land.
LanguageData.FishingMultiplierTooltip: Multiplier of fish gathered from fishing boat. 1 = normal, 4 = 4x as much
LanguageData.FishingDelayTooltip: Base amount of ticks it takes to gather fish on a fishing boat.
LanguageData.FishingSkillTooltip: How much exp is given by fishing on a boat
LanguageData.FishingPersistsTooltip: The Fishing Boat fishing selection will not reset upon drafting.
LanguageData.MatchWaterTerrainTooltip: Water tiles that are placed will match the water of adjacent water tiles (Disabled: Still WIP)
LanguageData.CompShips_CannotMove: Cannot draft. Vehicle needs more crew in order to navigate.
LanguageData.CompShips_OutOfFuel: Cannot draft. Vehicle needs more fuel.
LanguageData.CompUpgrade_UpgradeInProgress: Cannot draft while Vehicle is upgrading.
LanguageData.NotEnoughCannonCrew: Not enough colonists in {0} to operate {1}.
LanguageData.ShipGainsName: Your new boat has been named {0}
LanguageData.ShipSunkDeep: {0} has sunk to the depths of the ocean and has taken with it: {1}
LanguageData.ShipSunkShallow: {0} has sunk but is still salvageable.
LanguageData.ShipOutOfFood: No food in {0} with Pawns onboard
LanguageData.MessagePawnBoardedFormingCaravan: {0} has boarded the {1} and is ready for departure.
LanguageData.MessageCantAddWaypointBecauseNoShip: Must have a boat in order to travel across {0}
LanguageData.MessageCantAddWaypointBecauseShip: Cannot travel on land with boats.
LanguageData.MessageCantAddWaypointBecauseRiverUnreac: Boat is not able to travel on this river
LanguageData.CantMoveDocked: Not enough pawns to set sail.
LanguageData.PackingSpotNotFoundBoats: Packing Spot was not found for Vehicle caravan. It is recommended you place a Packing Spot from Misc.
LanguageData.ForceLeaveCaravanDesc: Force Vehicle Caravan to leave the map. Will skip loading whatever items are not currently onboard
LanguageData.BoatCaravanTerminatedNoBoats: Caravan process has been terminated. No boats remain.
LanguageData.IncapableStatusForRole: {0} is incapable of fulfilling this role.
LanguageData.LandAndSeaRoutePlannerRestriction: Cannot plan route for both Sea and Land vehicles. Paths will not register.
LanguageData.AutoTargetingDisabled: AutoTargeting is not allowed for this turret.
LanguageData.LeaveVehicleBehindCaravan: Are you sure you want to leave Vehicles behind? Vehicles left behind: {0}
LanguageData.MessageMustAssignEnoughToVehicle: Must assign enough colonists to man vehicle.
LanguageData.MustSelectPalette: Must have a palette selected to save over.
LanguageData.CommandDockShipDesc: Unload all passengers and enable trade with the Settlement of {0}.
LanguageData.CommandDockShipObjectDesc: Dock Boats and go on foot
LanguageData.CommandUndockShipDesc: Load all pawns and items into Boats
LanguageData.CommandAttackDockDisable: Cannot attack {0} while docked at their Settlement
LanguageData.CommandTradeDockDisable: Cannot trade with {0}. Must dock boat first
LanguageData.CaravanMustHaveEnoughSpaceOnShip: Not enough space on ships to house all pawns.
LanguageData.CaravanMustHaveEnoughPawnsToOperate: Not enough Pawns selected to set sail. Need {0}
LanguageData.DisabledFromOtherNode: Cannot upgrade. Node is now inaccessible from previous unlock.
